snippet: The jeweler claims that Costco was offering for sale what were promoted on in-store signs as Tiffany diamond engagement rings.
abstract: Tiffany & Co files lawsuit against Costco, saying that the discount warehouse chain falsely marketed rings as Tiffany diamond engagement rings; jeweler says that it has never sold nor will it ever sell its fine jewelry through off-price retailers and is asking for all profits made from selling the rings, as well as damages.
lead_paragraph: The jeweler claims that Costco was offering for sale what were promoted on in-store signs as Tiffany diamond engagement rings.

headline.seo: A Tiffany at Costco? Not Now, or Ever, Tiffany Lawsuit Says
headline.main: Tiffany Rings at Costco? Not Now, or Ever, the Jeweler Says
headline.print_headline: Tiffany Rings at Costco? Not Now, or Ever, the Jeweler Says
